Yes dear,

I did this,

But here what happened it just crawl its landing page [ default page ], nothing else...

I think its redirected domain does not have entry in the surt file, that is why it does not crawl other pages of redirected domain....

I fI put the entry of redirected domains into surt file then it crawl its other pages as well...

So please solve this issue without having entry of redirected pages into surt file...

Thanks in advance...

Regards,

Jigar Patel

Igor Ranitovic <igor@...> wrote:                                  Try setting LinksScoper's seed-redirects-new-seed to true.
 
 i.
 
 > Hi,
 > 
 > I am using SURTScope but I am facing a problem while seed is 
 > rediercted to some other URL....
 > 
 > Here I am using 
 > 
 > SurtPrefixScope: 
 > 
 > surts-source-file: Not provided
 > seeds-as-surt-prefixes: True
 > surts-dump-file: dump.txt
 > also-check-via: False
 > 
 > if my seed is www.xyz.com and it is redirected to the www.abc.com
 > then It does not crawl www.abc.com
 > 
 > But I need www.abc.com to be crawled...
 > 
 > Or even my seed contains pqr.com and inturn it redirects to the 
 > www.pqr.com then also it does not crawl www.pqr.com in same 
 > situation...
 > 
 > It works if I explicitely put those redirected host in the SURT file 
 > and provide this SURT file in the surts-source-file option...
 > 
 > Please help me on this.
 > 
 > Regards,
 > 
 > Jigar Patel
 > 
 > 
 > 
 >  
 > Yahoo! Groups Links
 > 
 > 
 >
